short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to close tabs of self-defined URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One click to close a group of tabs of self-defined URLs.

Simply define the rules by URL pieces. For example, if you define the following url rules, when you click the extension icon, it will close all blank tabs, Google search result tabs, and Stack Overflow question tabs:

---
chrome://
www.google.com/search?
stackoverflow.com/questions
---

Trust me, it will save you a lot time and make your life a little easier :-)
